question: Which of the following is the correct sequence of stages of data processing in a computer?
option1: Data Collection- Input Raw Data- Processing of Data-Information- Output
option2: Data Collection-Input Information-Processing of Data- Output
option3: Data Collection- Data Processing- Information-Data Output
answer: Data Collection- Input Raw Data- Processing of Data-Information- Output
explanation: The correct sequence of stages of data processing is Data Collection-Input Raw Data-Processing of Data-Information-Output
